HostMayo: Cheap VPS and Shared Hosting Starting at $5/Year (LA, Amsterdam)

amsterdam, cheap shared hosting, cheap vps, cpanel, directadmin, host mayo, hostmayo, los angeles, netherlands, USA September 16, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

We last had HostMayo on back in May 30, 2021 and now they’re back with some more cheap VPS and cheap shared hosting offers:

  • Get a 1GB VPS in either the Netherlands or US for only $30/year!
  • cPanel shared hosting starts at $1/mo ($12/year)!
  • DirectAdmin shared hosting starts at only $5/year!

Even if you need a big 100GB shared hosting package, you can get DirectAdmin for only $25/year.  Nice!

HostMayo‘s WHOIS is public. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Pyapal, Credit Cards, Bitcoin, ETH, LTC, USDT, TRON etc..

Here’s a little about HostMayo in their own words:

“Host Mayo has been in the web hosting business since 2015. We started from offering of simple shared hosting and now we offer complete range of hosting products like Business Web Hosting, Reseller Hosting, Linux VPS, Windows RDP & Dedicated Servers etc. We own our hardware in USA Los Angeles and Netherlands. Recently we got revamped our logo and website interface to look more sleek and to the point. Host Mayo 28 Google reviews with rating of 4.9. Our timelist and award history is available on our site.”

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!
